creditline: Gift of Mrs. Christian H. Aall in memory of her grandparents
description: Platter, ceramic, painted in tones of yellow, green, manganese and blue with flowers growing from behind a brushwood fence, rim with five floral panels separated by vase shaped cartouches painted in manganese and blue with trelliswork,     XIX c.  cat. card dims Diam. 11-1/4'
title: Dish
